creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
text: Reprinted probably in Nov. with the title 平壌玄武門乗越之場　陸軍歩兵一等卒　澤田重七、尾上菊五郎 for the play Kairiku renshō asahi-no-mihata 海陸連勝日章旗 staged at the Kabuki Theater.
title: Picture of Climbing Pyeongyang's Hyeonmu Gate, Army Infantrist Private First Class Harada Jūkichi
